attributes.action: Table a emergency motion to stop EU free movement being used by Terrorists ASAP
attributes.additional_details: With Terrorist attacks spreading across Europe by Extremists, The UK needs to act now to protect its people. No longer can we stand by passive in the hope these atrocities will stop they will not .Terrorists are using EU  free movement to attack us and human rights to stay in our country after criminal and terrorist activity. Migrant extremists and Migrant criminals known by Authorities  must now be repatriated to their home countries . Army to be deployed to ports to search lorries now
attributes.background: WE the people demand the house of commons stop free movement and strengthen our borders and increase Border control deportation staff to remove known migrant Extremists criminals and repeal Human rights they use to stay. We also require it made a criminal offence to fly the ISIS Flag or preach hate
